# Scores overview 
    
    
## Independent nadir scores  

<br>  
 

|               | SLA RMSE (m) | SLA RMSE score | SLA Effective res. (km) |
|---------------|------|------------|---------------- | 
|**MIOST**          |0.0470 | 53.9 %     |**116.4 km**        |
|**4DVarNet V2**          |**0.0455** | **54.3 %**       |118.3 km        |
 
 
<br>

## Independent drifter scores  
    
<br>  
 

|               | u RMSE (m/s) | u RMSE score | v RMSE (m/s) | v RMSE score |  
|---------------|--------|--------------|--------|--------------| 
|**MIOST**          | **0.138**  | **24.3 %**         | 0.134  | 18.5 %         |
|**4DVarNet V2**          | 0.140  |  23.0 %         | **0.135**  | **18.6 %**         |
